    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpandingTextArea

        public ExpandingTextArea()
        Constructs an empty ExpandingTextArea with no caption.

      • ExpandingTextArea

        public ExpandingTextArea(String caption)
        Constructs an empty ExpandingTextArea with given caption.
        Parameters:
        caption - the caption String for the editor.

      • ExpandingTextArea

        public ExpandingTextArea(com.vaadin.data.Property<?> dataSource)
        Constructs a new ExpandingTextArea that's bound to the specified Property and has no caption.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the Property to be edited with this editor.

      • ExpandingTextArea

        public ExpandingTextArea(String caption,
                 com.vaadin.data.Property<?> dataSource)
        Constructs a new ExpandingTextArea that's bound to the specified Property and has the given caption String.
        Parameters:
        caption - the caption String for the editor.
        dataSource - the Property to be edited with this editor.

      • ExpandingTextArea

        public ExpandingTextArea(String caption,
                 String value)
        Constructs a new ExpandingTextArea with the given caption and initial text contents. The editor constructed this way will not be bound to a Property unless Property.Viewer.setPropertyDataSource(Property) is called to bind it.
        Parameters:
        caption - the caption String for the editor.
        text - the initial text content of the editor.
